page.title: 19FOLK CUSTOMS
page.content:
Every year on the last Sunday of July Gullane Games week begins. During the week there are many competitions such as superstars, sand-modelling and pitch and putt.By the end of the week the Fair has arrived at Goose Green. There is a Games Dance on Friday where someone is chosen as Miss Gullane.The climax of the week is Saturday when in the afternoon there are races, a band and more competitions. In the evening at the end of the fancy dress parade Miss Gullane presents prizes to all the winners of the competitions. Evening ends with families crossing the road to go to the Fair.
In July Dirleton has a Flower Festival during which time all village gardens are open to the public.
